Terraria Tower Defense is finally out and there’s plenty of content to go through. The best way to get an overview of all Towers, accessories, and various mechanics is by visiting the Trello board and Discord server. Here’s where you can find the official Terraria Tower Defense Trello and Discord.

Terraria Tower Defense Trello And Other Links

Here are all the community hub links you’ll need to play Terraria Tower Defense:

  • Official Terraria Tower Defense Trello
  • Terraria Tower Defense Discord Server
  • Terraria TD Game Page
  • TTD Roblox Community Page

As you’re starting out the best place to visit first is the wiki-like hub called Trello. There you’ll find the best source of information for content in the game that’s regularly updated by a community team. It includes stuff like info on:

  • All Maps
  • Lobby Guide
  • All Towers
  • Tower Tier List
  • Game Mechanics
  • Codes
  • Weather and Events
  • All Accessories
  • All Items
  • All Reforges
  • All Enemies and Stats
  • All Bosses and Boss Guides
  • All Status Effects
  • All Events and Details

Once you’re done browsing the Trello and are actively playing the game, the Discord server is also great for more detailed info. Besides chatting with the community you can get specialized opinions from game veterans on the best towers, old and new.

It’s also a good place to stay informed on the latest announcements, updates, and patch notes. Staying up to date on new units and buffs and nerfs is crucial in Tower Defense games. Not to mention you’ll be able to track community tier lists of the best towers. Last but not least it’s where you can participate in community events, holiday giveaways, the latest codes, and much more.

That’s it for my Terraria Tower Defense Trello and Discord guide. Check out our Terraria TD codes for free goodies in the game.
